Name: Censer
Description: The censer is semi-circular in shape with a base and vertical decorative grooves in the walls. On the rim are three perforated extensions, in which chains consisting of two to three long sections are fastened. They are gathered together at the top by an anchor-shaped element with three loops at the bottom. This element is in its turn suspended from an s-shaped hook. Inside the basin some remnants of charred incense resin still remain.
